options.text: Future historians will be in a unique position when they come to record the history of our own times.
options.voiceText: Future historians will be in a unique position when they come to record the history of our own times.

options.text: They will hardly know which facts to select from the great mass of evidence that steadily accumulates.
options.voiceText: They will hardly know which facts to select from the great mass of evidence that steadily accumulates.

options.text: What is more, they will not have to rely solely on the written word.
options.voiceText: What is more, they will not have to rely solely on the written word.

options.text: Films, videos, CDs and CD-ROMs are just some of the bewildering amount of information they will have.
options.voiceText: Films, videos, CDs and CD ROMs are just some of the bewildering amount of information they will have.

options.text: They will be able, as it were, to see and hear us in action.
options.voiceText: They will be able, as it were, to see and hear us in action.

options.text: But the historian attempting to reconstruct the distant past is always faced with a difficult task.
options.voiceText: But the historian attempting to reconstruct the distant past is always faced with a difficult task.

options.text: He has to deduce what he can from the few scanty clues available.
options.voiceText: He has to deduce what he can from the few scanty clues available.

options.text: Even seemingly insignificant remains can shed interesting light on the history of early man.
options.voiceText: Even seemingly insignificant remains can shed interesting light on the history of early man.

options.text: Up to now, historians have assumed that calendars came into being with the advent of agriculture,
options.voiceText: Up to now, historians have assumed that calendars came into being with the advent of agriculture,

options.text: for then man was faced with a real need to understand something about the seasons.
options.voiceText: for then man was faced with a real need to understand something about the seasons.

options.text: Recent scientific evidence seems to indicate that this assumption is incorrect.
options.voiceText: Recent scientific evidence seems to indicate that this assumption is incorrect.

options.text: Historians have long been puzzled by dots, lines and symbols
options.voiceText: Historians have long been puzzled by dots, lines and symbols

options.text: which have been engraved on walls, bones, and the ivory tusks of mammoths.
options.voiceText: which have been engraved on walls, bones, and the ivory tusks of mammoths.

options.text: The nomads who made these markings lived by hunting and fishing during the last Ice Age which began about 35,000 B.C.
options.voiceText: The nomads who made these markings lived by hunting and fishing during the last Ice Age which began about thirty five thousand B.C.

options.text: and ended about 10,000 B.C.
options.voiceText: and ended about ten thousand B.C.

options.text: By correlating markings made in various parts of the world, historians have been able to read this difficult code.
options.voiceText: By correlating markings made in various parts of the world, historians have been able to read this difficult code.

options.text: They have found that it is connected with the passage of days and the phases of the moon.
options.voiceText: They have found that it is connected with the passage of days and the phases of the moon.

options.text: It is, in fact, a primitive type of calendar.
options.voiceText: It is, in fact, a primitive type of calendar.

options.text: It has long been known that the hunting scenes depicted on walls were not simply a form of artistic expression.
options.voiceText: It has long been known that the hunting scenes depicted on walls were not simply a form of artistic expression.

options.text: They had a definite meaning, for they were as near as early man could get to writing.
options.voiceText: They had a definite meaning, for they were as near as early man could get to writing.

options.text: It is possible that there is a definite relation between these paintings and the markings that sometimes accompany them.
options.voiceText: It is possible that there is a definite relation between these paintings and the markings that sometimes accompany them.

options.text: It seems that man was making a real effort to understand the seasons 20,000 years earlier than has been supposed.
options.voiceText: It seems that man was making a real effort to understand the seasons twenty thousand years earlier than has been supposed.

options.text: Save the Planet
options.voiceText: Save the Planet

subContents.content:
Over the last few years, my family and I have started working towards a greener life.

My mum and dad drive less and often take a bus to work.i

They are careful to save gas when they cook.i

We recycle things like paper, cans and bottles,i

and we give old clothes and furniture to charities.i

In order to save energy,i

we turn off the lights during the day or when they are not being used.i

options.text: Over the last few years, my family and I have started working towards a greener life.
options.voiceText: Over the last few years, my family and I have started working towards a greener life.

options.text: My mum and dad drive less and often take a bus to work.
options.voiceText: My mum and dad drive less and often take a bus to work.

options.text: They are careful to save gas when they cook.
options.voiceText: They are careful to save gas when they cook.

options.text: We recycle things like paper, cans and bottles,
options.voiceText: We recycle things like paper, cans and bottles,

options.text: and we give old clothes and furniture to charities.
options.voiceText: and we give old clothes and furniture to charities.

options.text: In order to save energy,
options.voiceText: In order to save energy,

options.text: we turn off the lights during the day or when they are not being used.
options.voiceText: we turn off the lights during the day or when they are not being used.

subContents.content:
Is all that enough?

I believe there is a lot more we can do.i

For example, we will try to use less water by turning off the tap while we brush our teeth,i

and reusing the washing machine water to flush the toilet.i

Taking shorter showers will help too, as it will save water.i

Every member of our family will take part.i

options.text: Is all that enough?
options.voiceText: Is all that enough?

options.text: I believe there is a lot more we can do.
options.voiceText: I believe there is a lot more we can do.

options.text: For example, we will try to use less water by turning off the tap while we brush our teeth,
options.voiceText: For example, we will try to use less water by turning off the tap while we brush our teeth,

options.text: and reusing the washing machine water to flush the toilet.
options.voiceText: and reusing the washing machine water to flush the toilet.

options.text: Taking shorter showers will help too, as it will save water.
options.voiceText: Taking shorter showers will help too, as it will save water.

options.text: Every member of our family will take part.
options.voiceText: Every member of our family will take part.

subContents.content:
Saving the planet needs everyone's effort.

Although each one of us may only do a little, together we can make a big difference.i

Let's work together to make our planet a better place to live.i
